import java.io.*;
public class PlayerCharacter implements Serializable	{       ///직렬화
	String name;
	int HP;
	int MP;
	int ATK;
	int EVA;
	String[] Spells;
	
	public PlayerCharacter(String n, int h, int m, int a, int e, String[] s)	{
		name = n;
		HP = h;
		MP = m;
		ATK = a;
		EVA = e;
		Spells = s;
	}
	
	public String getName()	{
		return name;
	}
	public int getHP()	{
		return HP;
	}
	public int getMP()	{
		return MP;
	}
	public int getATK()	{
		return ATK;
	}
	public int getEVA()	{
		return EVA;
	}
	public String getSpells()	{
		String spellList = "";
		
		for	(int i = 0; i < Spells.length; i++)	{
			spellList += Spells[i] + " "; 
		}
		return spellList;
	}
}
